quarks.window

Class PartitionedState<K,S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.window.PartitionedState<K,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type.
    S - State type.

    public abstract class PartitionedState<K,S>
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintain partitioned state. Abstract class that can be used to maintain state for each keyed partition in a Window.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected PartitionedState(Supplier<S> initialState)
      Construct with an initial state function.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Get the current state for key.
      protected S removeState(K key) 
      protected S setState(K key, S state)
      Set the current state for key.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PartitionedState

        protected PartitionedState(Supplier<S> initialState)
        Construct with an initial state function.
        Parameters:
        initialState - Function used to create the initial state for a key.
        See Also:
        getState(Object)

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        protected S getState(K key)
        Get the current state for key. If no state is held then initialState.get() is called to create the initial state for key.
        Parameters:
        key - Partition key.
        Returns:
        State for key.

      • setState

        protected S setState(K key,
                     S state)
        Set the current state for key.
        Parameters:
        key - Partition key.
        state - State for key
        Returns:
        Previous state for key, will be null if no state was held.

      • removeState

        protected S removeState(K key)
        Parameters:
        key - Partition key.
        Returns:
        Removed state for key, will be null if no state was held.
